title: Is ZEE5 enough for family entertainment needs? - Quora

response.answer_text: The ZEE5 Club Pack is also an affordable entertainment pack priced at the fee of Rs, 365/- per annum. I though it was good. So i downloaded this app. I couldn't find my favorite movies or shows there. It was on a premium pack. I paid that too after that i severely dis appointed. They detected my money and its started showing continuously there is sever error. There is no customer care, so i e-mailed them. They promised that they will sort this issue. They didn't re-pay my money and i was not able to watch my favorite shows nor movies. The app i also terrible. Finally i uninstalled my app. very poor performance. coming to your question, due to this experience i can’t able to watch shows.

When it comes to OTT platforms, nothing is enough. It is enough if you are a random viewer, but no OTT platform has every movie. So if you want wide collection of movies, it is not enough but if you select your movies/web series on the app itself, it's good enough.
